name: Ctd-planning-site-wendyhan
body:
### WP1: Setting Up

Brain Storm 

Objective
- Give informations to people

Food Blog
- It will be about food in HK
- We are going to rate the taste and the price
- Post photos and videos of the food.
- Do surveys to get recommendations of kinds of food and restaurants

Cloth Shop
- Online shop for both boys and girls
- It will be cheap and pretty
- Order Online
